messages.content: What is Nexora?

Nexora is a subscription platform created for UiT SE ADBMS Course (CS-7313). Project created by Wint War Shwe Yee, Naw Lal Yee Than Han, Chaw Su Han, Kaung Myat Thu, Kaung Kyaw Han. It provides dashboards for readers, creators, and admins with monthly membership, premium content gating, bookmarks, and a rich content editor.
Who created Nexora?
Nexora was created for UiT SE ADBMS Course (CS-7313) by Wint War Shwe Yee, Naw Lal Yee Than Han, Chaw Su Han, Kaung Myat Thu, Kaung Kyaw Han.
Who built project Nexora?
Project Nexora is a subscription platform created for UiT SE ADBMS Course (CS-7313) by Wint War Shwe Yee, Naw Lal Yee Than Han, Chaw Su Han, Kaung Myat Thu, Kaung Kyaw Han.
Tell me about project Nexora.

Nexora is a subscription platform created for UiT SE ADBMS Course (CS-7313). Project created by Wint War Shwe Yee, Naw Lal Yee Than Han, Chaw Su Han, Kaung Myat Thu, Kaung Kyaw Han, featuring monthly membership, premium gating, and creator tools.
How do I upgrade to Premium on Nexora?
From the reader dashboard, click Upgrade to Premium. This starts checkout for the monthly membership. Once active, you can read all premium stories without the blur gate.
How do I manage billing on Nexora?
Use the Manage Billing button in the Membership tab of your reader dashboard. It opens the billing portal to update payment methods or cancel your plan.
How does premium content gating work on Nexora?
Premium stories show a preview and then display a blur gate with an Upgrade prompt. Premium members can view the full content immediately.
Where can I find my bookmarks on Nexora?
Open your reader dashboard and go to the Bookmarks tab. All saved articles appear there with quick actions.
I'm a creator. Can I view other creators' content on Nexora?
Yes. Creators have an active membership and can browse and read other creators' premium content like any member.
How do I write a new post on Nexora?
From the Creator Dashboard, click Write New Post. You will be taken to the rich content editor where you can compose and publish.
Does Nexora support dark mode?
Yes. The site uses a theme provider and adapts to your system preference. You can also toggle the theme from the dashboard header.
How can admins moderate content on Nexora?
Admins can approve, remove, or review reported content from the Admin Dashboard under the Content Moderation tab.
How do I update my profile on Nexora?
Click Profile in the reader dashboard header to open Profile Settings and edit your name, email, bio, and newsletter preferences.
How much does Nexora Premium cost per month?
Premium is a monthly membership. Pricing is shown during checkout and managed via the billing portal.
How do I read the full premium story on Nexora?
Upgrade to Premium from your dashboard to unlock the full content instantly.
How do I share an article from Nexora?
Use the Share button on cards to share via your device's native share menu.
How do I edit or delete a post on Nexora?
Open the post in the Creator Dashboard and choose Edit or Delete from the post actions.
Can admins ban a user on Nexora?
Yes. Admins can take actions like suspend or ban via the user management tools.
Where do I find settings in Nexora?
Open the dashboard header menu or the sidebar Settings item to access preferences.
What can the Nexora chatbot help me with?
It assists with content creation tips, billing, membership, analytics, and navigation.
Does Nexora support mobile devices?
Yes. The layout and sidebar are responsive and optimized for mobile.
Is there a free plan on Nexora? (v2)
Yes. You can use Nexora on a free tier, but premium stories are gated until you upgrade. (Details 2).
How do I read the full premium story on Nexora? (v2)
Upgrade to Premium from your dashboard to unlock the full content instantly. (Details 2).
How do I share an article from Nexora? (v2)
Use the Share button on cards to share via your device's native share menu. (Details 2).
How do I edit or delete a post on Nexora? (v2)
Open the post in the Creator Dashboard and choose Edit or Delete from the post actions. (Details 2).
How do admins review reported content on Nexora? (v2)
From the Admin Dashboard, open Content Moderation to approve, remove, or review reports. (Details 2).
What is the sidebar navigation in Nexora? (v2)
The sidebar provides quick access to Discover, Library, Subscriptions, and role-specific tools. (Details 2).
What can the Nexora chatbot help me with? (v2)
It assists with content creation tips, billing, membership, analytics, and navigation. (Details 2).
What tech stack does Nexora use? (v2)
Nexora uses Next.js with React, Tailwind, and a component system for the UI. (Details 2).
